@HerVioletEyes @DJ_Trevalin *hugs!* I'm glad! It was either that or like a 3ft statue of an alien guy. Thought this would be more useful :)
Happy Birthday, @DJ_Trevalin~! :D I hid something for you in the garage. ^_^

@northern_terror ((Vi feels that Evelyn can be really mean to people, but thinks she has a good heart in there. Secret softy. :P ))
@SakiOmikuji ((Misses Saki too. :( ))
@Jude_Shinohara ((Vi thinks Jude is a bright ray of sunshine. If only more people were as concerned for the happiness of others.))

@TheOtherYuki ((Yuki's a total cutie pie. Vi wants to get to know her better and hopes that Yuki will come out of her shell some day soon))
@HerVioletEyes ((Heartseyes right back forever and ever, of course. ^_^))
((Okie. Let's try this... It's a little late but what does your character think of Vi? I'll try to answer back as soon as I can. :) ))

@DJ_Trevalin ((Vi thinks of Trevor as the big brother she never had. He's dealing with some heavy stuff and she wishes could be more help))
@HerVioletEyes ((Vi thinks Lia is amazingly talented and a wonderful person, but knows there's much more to her than just the surface.))

@HerVioletEyes Says the total cutie~! <3
@Eboni_Uto Seeming? I hope so, hun. :( Lemme know if I can help.

@Bookwyrm87 I just thought they were cute! D:
@VillicanaAlicia @GeishaDollGirl @Give_Em_HEC That would make sure that everyone has a chance to enjoy them all before they go bad! :)
@GarretJefferies I'm doing well! Work's been keeping me busy and traveling so that's fun. Glad to hear you're doing well too! :)
@GeishaDollGirl @VillicanaAlicia @Give_Em_HEC Goodness. ^_^;
@GeishaDollGirl @VillicanaAlicia @Give_Em_HEC Thank you! :D But why? There's so many, even when we give them to charity, many go to waste!
@GarretJefferies ^_^ Haven't heard from you in a long time. How are you, hun?
@GeishaDollGirl @VillicanaAlicia @Give_Em_HEC Mm, were you the one that sent all of these?
@GeishaDollGirl @VillicanaAlicia @Give_Em_HEC Oh my. ^_^; I like soft oatmeal cookies to be honest, but I don't eat very many, you know!
@Fleetwood_Smack Yay! I'm glad. :D
I think I'll try these glasses on today. They're not prescription or anything. What do you guys think? :D http://t.co/zzCPvwxBcb
@VillicanaAlicia @Give_Em_HEC @GeishaDollGirl D: So many cookies.
@VillicanaAlicia @Give_Em_HEC @GeishaDollGirl But why would she send them all?
@VillicanaAlicia @Give_Em_HEC @GeishaDollGirl They seem to be safe for eating tho, so please feel free to drop by and grab a box or ten. :D
@VillicanaAlicia @Give_Em_HEC @GeishaDollGirl Oh! I mean I really don't know who sent all these. D:
@VillicanaAlicia @Give_Em_HEC @GeishaDollGirl I'm not sure, actually. D:
@StuckeyWeaver @Give_Em_HEC Gluten free. They smell really good!
@HerVioletEyes She's so adorable~! <3
